sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { useEffect } from "react"; import { db } from "../firebase"; import { query, collection,onSnapshot } from "firebase/firestore"; import { useState } from "react"; function Section(announcement) { const [board, setBoard] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { const q = query(collection(db, "board")); const unsubcribe = onSnapshot(q, (querySnapshot) => { let boardArr = []; querySnapshot.forEach((doc) => { boardArr.push({ ...doc.data(), id: doc.id }); }); setBoard(boardArr); }) return () => unsubcribe }, []); return ( <>
{ board.map((announcement,index) =>(
{announcement.name}
999 ₽

{board.price}

Каналы связи

)) } {/*
HP Notebook
999 ₽

Общежитие №8

Каналы связи

HP Notebook
999 ₽

Общежитие №8

Каналы связи

*/}
); } export default Section;
